Adjust the mode from basic (with a limit: Adjust the mode from basic (with a limited number of beginner-user-friendly apps) to full (with all basic & advanced apps available)
Manage your connection to Ledger S: Manage your connection to Ledger S
Override the default identity icon displ: Override the default identity icon display with a specific theme
Override the default ss58 prefix for add: Override the default ss58 prefix for address generation
Select the remote endpoint, either from: Select the remote endpoint, either from the dropdown on manual entered via the custom toggle
The RPC node can be selected from the pr: The RPC node can be selected from the pre-defined list or manually entered, depending on the chain you wish to connect to.
Waiting for authorization from the exten: Waiting for authorization from the extension. Please open the installed extension and approve or reject access.
Waiting to make a connection to the remo: Waiting to make a connection to the remote endpoint and finishing API initialization.
You are connecting from a secure locatio: You are connecting from a secure location to an insecure WebSocket ({{wsUrl}}). Due to browser mixed-content security policies this connection type is not allowed. Change the RPC service to a secure 'wss' endpoint.
You are not connected to a node. Ensure: You are not connected to a node. Ensure that your node is running and that the Websocket endpoint is reachable.
